issue.title: Build SplitSync App
issue.body:
Build SplitSync expense sharing app with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS.

Features:
1. User authentication
2. Group management
3. Expense tracking
4. Balance calculations
5. Settlements
6. Real-time updates

ems.task: Create project foundation with configuration files, CI/CD workflow, environment templates, and README. NO implementation code - only setup and infrastructure files.

workers.task: Create all project foundation files: .gitignore, package.json with dependencies (Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io, Tailwind CSS), tsconfig.json, GitHub Actions CI/CD workflow at .github/workflows/ci.yml, Dockerfile, .env.example, and README.md with project overview and setup instructions

ems.task: Implement data layer with Drizzle ORM schema, database migrations, connection pooling, and repository pattern for all entities.

workers.task: Create Drizzle schema for users table (id, email, passwordHash, name, createdAt, updatedAt). Output: src/db/schema/users.ts
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create Drizzle schema for groups table (id, name, description, ownerId, createdAt, updatedAt). Output: src/db/schema/groups.ts
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create Drizzle schema for group_members table (id, groupId, userId, role, joinedAt). Output: src/db/schema/group-members.ts
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

ems.task: Build authentication system with NextAuth.js, session management, password hashing, and protected route middleware.

workers.task: Create Drizzle schema for users table with id, email, passwordHash, name, createdAt fields. Output: src/db/schema.ts with users table export
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create Drizzle schema for sessions table with id, userId, expires, sessionToken fields. Output: src/db/schema.ts with sessions table ADDED (Depends on Worker-1)

Create Drizzle schema for accounts table with id, userId, type, provider, providerAccountId, refresh_token, access_token, expires_at, token_type, scope, id_token, session_state fields. Output: src/db/schema.ts with accounts table ADDED (Depends on Worker-2)

ems.task: Create group management API endpoints for CRUD operations, member invitations, and permission handling.

workers.task: Create Drizzle schema for groups table (id, name, description, ownerId, createdAt, updatedAt). Output: src/db/schema/groups.ts
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create Drizzle schema for group_members table (id, groupId, userId, role, joinedAt). Output: src/db/schema/group-members.ts. Depends on Worker-1 creating groups table
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create Drizzle schema for group_invitations table (id, groupId, invitedByEmail, invitedEmail, role, status, createdAt, expiresAt). Output: src/db/schema/group-invitations.ts
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

ems.task: Build expense tracking API with transaction recording, categorization, receipt uploads, and expense history.

workers.task: Create Drizzle schema for expenses table (id, groupId, paidBy, amount, description, category, receiptUrl, createdAt). Output: src/db/schema/expenses.ts
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create expense categories enum type with values (food, transport, accommodation, entertainment, utilities, shopping, healthcare, other). Output: src/lib/types/expense.ts
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create POST API route at app/api/expenses/route.ts with expense validation, Drizzle insert, and Socket.io emission. Output: app/api/expenses/route.ts
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

ems.task: Implement balance calculation engine with debt graph algorithms, simplified debt optimization, and settlement recommendations.

workers.task: Create BalanceCalculator utility class with calculateBalances method that computes net balances for each user in a group. Output: src/lib/calculations/BalanceCalculator.ts with calculateBalances method
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create DebtGraphBuilder utility class that constructs a directed graph representation of debts between users based on expense splits. Output: src/lib/calculations/DebtGraphBuilder.ts with buildDebtGraph method
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create SimplifyDebts utility class with greedy algorithm to minimize number of transactions while preserving net balances. Output: src/lib/calculations/SimplifyDebts.ts with simplify method
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

ems.task: Build real-time notification system using Socket.io for live updates on expenses, settlements, and group activities.

workers.task: Create Socket.io server configuration in src/lib/socket/server.ts with initialization, CORS settings, and HTTP server integration. Output: Configured Socket.io server instance ready for Next.js API route
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create Socket.io API route at app/api/socket/route.ts that wraps the Socket.io server for Next.js App Router. Output: Working API route that initializes Socket.io server
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create Socket.io client hook in src/hooks/useSocket.ts for browser-side connection with auto-reconnect. Output: React hook returning connected socket instance
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

ems.task: Create reusable UI components including forms, cards, modals, navigation, and expense visualizations.

workers.task: Create base Button component with variants (primary, secondary, danger, ghost) in src/components/ui/Button.tsx
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create Input component with label, error states, and helper text in src/components/ui/Input.tsx
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create Card component with header, body, and footer sections in src/components/ui/Card.tsx
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

ems.task: Build main application pages for dashboard, groups, expenses, settlements, and user settings with data fetching and state management.

workers.task: Create dashboard page at app/dashboard/page.tsx with user summary cards (total balance, owe, owed) and recent activity list. Fetch data from /api/dashboard
Create groups page at app/groups/page.tsx with list of user's groups and 'Create Group' button. Fetch groups from /api/groups
Create group detail page at app/groups/[id]/page.tsx with group info, expense list, and member balances. Fetch from /api/groups/[id]

ems.task: Implement settlement workflow with payment tracking, partial payments, and settlement history with export functionality.

workers.task: Create Drizzle schema for settlements table with id, amount, payerId, receiverId, groupId, status, settledAt, createdAt fields. Output: src/db/schema.ts with settlements table exported
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Add partialPayments table to existing src/db/schema.ts with id, settlementId, amount, paymentDate, notes fields. Depends on Worker-1 creating settlements table
Create POST API route at app/api/settlements/route.ts to create new settlement with validation and group membership check

ems.task: Add comprehensive testing with Jest/Playwright, E2E tests for critical flows, and load testing for WebSocket connections.

workers.task: Create Jest configuration file with Next.js integration. Output: jest.config.js with test environment and module path mappings
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

workers.task: Create test setup file with global mocks and test utilities. Output: tests/setup.ts with common mocks and test helpers
Create test utilities file for authentication testing helpers. Output: tests/helpers/auth.ts with login, signup mock functions
workers.error: No unique commits - changes already in base branch

analysisSummary: Build SplitSync expense sharing app with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS. Implementation includes user authentication, group management, expense tracking with balance calculations, settlements, and real-time updates via WebSocket.
